text: is there any talk of allowing workflows to communicate more with hubdb tables? Specifically hoping for If/then logic ( if tables contains variable, send email based on a value in the table row, kinda thing)
or is that already possible with the api and I'm just not aware

I think they’re avoiding adding that for now for security/privacy reasons. HubDBs are public, so they don’t want you to say take form submissions and pop them into a hubDB because if done unwisely you could expose people’s sensitive information.
